name: Sourabh Patil
title: Product Owner / Business Analyst
tagline: Building compliant, scalable e‑commerce and payments products for global markets
h1b_note: Open to Product Owner / Business Analyst roles (H‑1B transfer)
quick_facts: Domains: Licensing (DEA/TDDD/E222), Payments/Autopay, Budget, MTA Approvals, Reporting
Tooling: Jira, Confluence, SQL/PL‑SQL, Power BI, Azure
achievements: Standardized 30+ payment error codes into clear, customer‑friendly categories for Statements & Payments.
Drove license workflows (DEA / TDDD / E222) with JDE‑backed verification and auditability.
Reusable designs for budget restrictions, multi‑tier approvals, and license attestation prompts across locales.
Aligned analytics semantics between backend models and Power BI reports to ensure metric parity.

experience.summary: Owned end‑to‑end delivery across License Management, Budget Management, Statements & Payments, Shopping Cart, Reporting, and Approvals in GEP.
bullets: Drove backlog, authored stories & ACs, ran grooming/sprint planning; partnered with Deloitte (US/CA/EU) & TCS (UK/IE).
Codified market‑specific compliance logic (DEA, TDDD, E222); ensured JDE integration and audit traceability.
Standardized error taxonomy for 30+ payment failures to improve UX, observability, and support efficiency.
Validated UX for AutoPay enrollment, budget restrictions, and license attestation prompts.

experience.summary: First point of contact for offshore dev teams. Authored BRDs/FRDs, diagrams, and managed UAT/SIT cycles across modules.
bullets: Built PL/SQL checks for migrated licensing/ordering datasets; partnered with QA for data integrity.
Aligned analytics KPIs with Power BI semantics; ensured front‑end reports matched backend models.
Resolved production issues in OneWeb; translated legacy behaviors to GEP without regressions.

experience.summary: RPA/automation‑oriented BA: process discovery, feasibility, and solution validation across data pipelines.
bullets: Wrote SQL/PL‑SQL to standardize disparate datasets; supported migrations & integrity checks.
Partnered with Change Delivery to ensure automations fit end‑to‑end process flows.

case_studies.title: License Management – Unified Attestation & Verification
case_studies.summary: Designed end‑to‑end journeys (add, validate, verify) with inline error states; ensured manual JDE overrides are reflected in prompts and checkout gating.

case_studies.title: Statements & Payments – AutoPay + Failure Taxonomy
case_studies.summary: Shaped AutoPay enrollment UX and consolidated 30+ error codes into a human‑readable taxonomy to reduce confusion and support time.

case_studies.title: Budget Controls & Multi‑Tier Approvals
case_studies.summary: Clarified BOA vs Credit‑Card only behaviors; defined thresholds, routing, and pending‑order change handling.

case_studies.title: Modify Reports – Pre‑filled Flows
case_studies.summary: Enabled partial edits with pre‑filled steps; restricted date‑range where not applicable (eCatalogs).

skills.Product & Delivery: Jira, Confluence, Agile/Scrum/SAFe, Backlog, Grooming, Sprint Planning, UAT/SIT
skills.Data & Reporting: SQL/PL‑SQL, Power BI, Tableau, Excel (Pivots/Macros), Azure (Data Lake/ADF)
skills.Domains: Regulatory Commerce, Payments, Budget Controls, Approvals, Reporting
skills.Collaboration: Deloitte & TCS partner management, SME pre‑alignment, design reviews
skills.Certifications: IBM GenAI for Product Owners; CSPO (in progress)
